synopsis.text: After defeating the demon king fifteen years ago, the kingdom entered an era of peace. Kotone Kazairo, a newly graduated mage, moves to the royal capital seeking a place to settle down. She ends up working at RPG Real Estate, a property firm tasked with finding ideal homes for eccentric clients. Together with her quirky colleagues - the pragmatic priest Rufuria, fierce warrior Rakira, and cute demihuman Fa - Kotone assists fantasy beings with specialized housing needs. From cloud castles for weather mages to underwater abodes for merfolk, RPG Real Estate caters to a diverse customer base. Though satisfying their choosy patrons can prove challenging, Kotone remains dedicated to securing each client the perfect home. With persistence and creativity, she aims to bring joy one house at a time!
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
